about:
Hi, I'm Adithyan, a passionate software developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering. Technology has always fascinated me, and the more I understand the more I want to learn. I spent my free time tweaking stuff on my linux pc (I use arch btw :) ), watching anime or doing workouts. 

 A good quote to think about:

          "What I cannot create, I do not understand" 
                               ~Richard Feynman
